code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import axios from"axios";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProfileView=()=>{const[profile,setProfile]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{axios.get("https://me-api-playground-22ao.onrender.com/profile").then(res=>setProfile(res.data[0])).catch(err=>console.log(err));},[]);if(!profile)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Loading profile..."});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card mb-4 shadow-sm",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-body",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"card-title",children:profile.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Email:"})," ",profile.email]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Education:"})," ",profile.education]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Work:"})," ",profile.work]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Skills:"})," ",profile.skills.join(", ")]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Links:"})," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:profile.links.github,target:"_blank",rel:"noreferrer",children:"GitHub"})," | ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:profile.links.linkedin,target:"_blank",rel:"noreferrer",children:"LinkedIn"})," | ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:profile.links.portfolio,target:"_blank",rel:"noreferrer",children:"Portfolio"})]})]})});};export default ProfileView;
